sections.heading: Inappropriate tribunalIf a petition or comparable pleading is received by an inappropriate tribunal of this state, the tribunal shall forward the pleading and accompanying documents to an appropriate tribunal in this state or another state and notify the petitioner where and when the pleading was se
sections.text: Inappropriate tribunalIf a petition or comparable pleading is received by an inappropriate tribunal of this state, the tribunal shall forward the pleading and accompanying documents to an appropriate tribunal in this state or another state and notify the petitioner where and when the pleading was sent.Acts 1995, No. 251, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1996; Acts 1997, No. 1241, ยง1, eff. July 15, 1997; Acts 2015, No. 80, ยง1, eff. July 1, 2015.
